article.headline: Iona 81, Portland State 75
article.story: AMES, Iowa (AP) -- Ricky Soliver scored a career-high 30 points and Steve Burtt had 10 of his 27 in the final two minutes, helping Iona hold on for an 81-75 victory over Portland State on Friday night in the Cyclone Challenge. Iona (2-0) had to scramble down the stretch after leading by 20 points in the first half and by 16 midway through the second half. Soliver fell two assists short of a triple-double in topping his previous best of 27 points against St. Peter's in 2004. He hit 10 of 14 shots, collected 10 of his team's 21 steals and handed out eight assists. Portland State (1-3) pulled ahead twice near the end, the second time at 68-67 on Anthony Washington's turnaround shot with 2:26 left. Iona went back ahead for good at 69-68 when Burtt banked in an off-balance shot from a difficult angle on the left side with 1:57 to play. After Iona's Marvin McCullough hit a free throw to make it 70-68, the Gaels sank 11 straight foul shots in the final 51 seconds, including eight by Burtt, to wrap it up. Before that stretch, the Gaels had been 4-for-18 at the line in the second half. Ryan Sommer led Portland State with 16 points, Jake Schroeder scored 15 and Juma Kamara 13. The Vikings rallied despite committing 27 turnovers, hitting five 3-pointers during a 24-8 run that erased Iona's 56-40 lead and tied it at 64 with 3:54 left. Iona plays Iowa State in the round-robin event on Saturday night, while Portland State meets Howard.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
